Package edu.monash.fit2099.gridworld

Class Grid<T extends edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.space.Location>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.space.LocationContainer<T>
      • edu.monash.fit2099.gridworld.Grid<T>

  • public abstract class Grid<T extends edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.space.Location>
extends edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.space.LocationContainer<T>
    Grid is a base class for a 2D array of Locations. It supports a maximum of 8-way movements in directions N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W and NW. Movements might be limited for Entities at Locations that have less than 8 neighboring Locations.

    CompassBearing is an inner enum class that manages the Directions of this Grid

    Generated using UML Lab

    Author:
    ram

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Grid.CompassBearing
      Class that manages the direction in which an Entity is heading as shown by a compass.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocationByCoordinates

        public T getLocationByCoordinates​(int x,
                                  int y)
        Method that returns the Location at the given coordinates (x, y) of this Grid.

        Note that the origin (0,0) is at the top left hand corner of the grid and y coordinates are always zero or positive and increase moving from North to South. x coordinates are always zero or positive and increase moving from West to East.

        Parameters:
        x - West/East coordinate of desired Location
        y - North/South coordinate of desired Location
        Returns:
        the Location at the given coordinates

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight​()
        Returns for the height of this Grid.

        Height of this Grid is required by the Views/User Interfaces (Implementations of GridRenderer) to display this Grid as a map.

        Specified by:
        getHeight in class edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.space.LocationContainer<T extends edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.space.Location>
        Returns:
        Height of this Grid.
